entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
